title: Countries move to cut air links with southern Africa amid news of virulent new coronavirus variant
content:
1. Countries move to cut air links with southern Africa amid news of virulent new coronavirus variant  The Washington Post
  2. Coronavirus variant fear sparks Africa travel curbs  BBC News
  3. A new Covid-19 variant with high number of mutations sparks travel bans and worries scientists  CNN
  4. European and Asian nations suspend flights to southern Africa as new Covid variant raises concerns  CNBC
  5. Fears over “worst ever” Covid variant as UK bans flights from southern Africa - BBC News  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Countries move to cut air links with southern Africa amid news of virulent new coronavirus variant  The Washington Post
Coronavirus variant fear sparks Africa travel curbs  BBC News
A new Covid-19 variant with high number of mutations sparks travel bans and worries scientists  CNN
European and Asian nations suspend flights to southern Africa as new Covid variant raises concerns  CNBC
Fears over “worst ever” Covid variant as UK bans flights from southern Africa - BBC News  BBC News

localize.title: 新型コロナウイルスの発生を受けて、各国がアフリカ南部との航空路の遮断を決定
有消息称新的冠状病毒变种毒性大，各国纷纷切断与南部非洲的航空联系
有消息稱新的冠狀病毒變種毒性大，各國紛紛切斷與南部非洲的航空聯繫
